SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.leafnoise.pathfinder.mongo.annotations
Annotation Type MongoGatewayConfig

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,PARAMETER})
public @interface MongoGatewayConfig

Annotation that configures MongoGateway injected Object.
Via this annotation a database and a collection can be configured directly into the injected MongoGateway Singleton object.

Author:
Jorge Morando
See Also:
MongoGateway, MongoGatewaySingleton

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String collection
          Collection to be used by the MongoGateway
 
Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String database
          Database to used by the MongoGateway
 

Element Detail

collection

public abstract java.lang.String collection
Collection to be used by the MongoGateway

database

public abstract java.lang.String database
Database to used by the MongoGateway

Default:
""
